summary: All three requested coach-UI requirements (display Member ID on profile and list, plus one-tap copy with confirmation) appear to be implemented in the modified frontend member pages, with an added clipboard utility to support copying.

hallucinated_features.description: Members list search now also matches against Member ID (member.id) in addition to name and program type.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-20 only asked to display Member ID on member cards; it did not request changing search behavior.
